login.title: Sign In
login.description: Sign in to your account to access team management, analytics and data sync features.

signup.title: Sign Up
signup.description: Create your account and start efficiently managing teams, tracking analytics and sync data.
signup.keywords: sign up, registration, create account, teams

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.description: Recover access to your account. Enter your email to receive a password reset link.
resetPassword.keywords: reset password, password recovery, forgot password

verifyEmail.title: Verify Email
verifyEmail.description: Verify your email address to complete registration and get full access to all features.
verifyEmail.keywords: email verification, verify email, account verification

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: View detailed team performance analytics. Analyze metrics, reports and statistics to make informed decisions.

retro.title: Retro
retro.description: Run a live retrospective with your team. Share feedback, answer questions, and reflect together to improve team collaboration and trust.
retro.keywords: retro, team retrospective, feedback, team collaboration, live session

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your account settings. Manage profile, security and other account preferences.

syncLive.title: Sync Live
syncLive.description: Monitor team data sync in real-time. Track activity and updates.

syncSettings.title: Sync Settings
syncSettings.description: Configure team data sync parameters. Configure who will participate in the daily sync and set their order.

teammates.title: Teammates
teammates.description: Manage your teammates. Add new teammates, edit information and track their activity.
teammates.keywords: teammates, team members, team management, employees

teams.title: Teams
teams.description: Manage, customize, and oversee your teams. Update team details, and manage teammates with ease.
teams.keywords: teams, team management, create team, organization

home.title: Team Management and Analytics Platform
home.description: Efficient team management platform with sync and performance analytics. Track progress, manage teammates, and analyze results.
home.keywords: team management, analytics, sync, performance, productivity

cookiesPolicy.title: Cookies Policy
cookiesPolicy.description: Learn how we use cookies on our website, including the types of cookies we use, why we use them, and how you can manage your cookie preferences.
cookiesPolicy.keywords: cookies policy, cookie usage, session cookies, persistent cookies, website tracking, user preferences, privacy, daylik, browser settings, disable cookies, manage cookies

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: Learn how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal data when using our Service, including information about cookies, data retention, user rights, and third-party sharing.
privacyPolicy.keywords: privacy policy, personal data, cookies, data collection, data usage, gdpr, user rights, data protection, service providers, daylik, account security, legal compliance

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.description: Review the terms and conditions governing your use of our Service, including user responsibilities, limitations of liability, dispute resolution, and legal compliance.
termsAndConditions.keywords: terms and conditions, user agreement, service terms, liability, dispute resolution, legal compliance, data protection, website terms, daylik, service usage, privacy

password.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long

password.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long

messages.confirmation: We've sent you a confirmation link to your email address. Please check your inbox and click the link to verify your account.
messages.passwordReset: We've sent you a password reset link to your email address. Please check your inbox and click the link to update your password.

hero.title: Analytics
hero.description: Review your daily sync analytics and team engagement. Gain insights from each session, track participation trends, and reflect on team dynamics to improve future collaboration.

chart.title: Sync Timeline
chart.description: A complete breakdown of today's sync

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: Your feedback helps us improve the service for everyone.

message.label: Message
message.required: Message must be at least 2 characters

messages.success: Your feedback helps us get better every day!

notes.title: Retro Notes
notes.description: Write, edit and save your thoughts during retros. You can revisit them later anytime.

qr.title: Ask Anonymously
qr.description: Your teammates can scan the QR code and submit anonymous questions in real-time during the retro.

hero.title: Settings
hero.description: Manage your personal settings and preferences. Update your settings, customize your experience, and keep your account details up to date for a smoother workflow.

subscription.title: Active Subscription
subscription.description: Manage your subscription and billing details. Update your subscription plan, view your billing history, and manage your payment methods.

plan.name: Open Beta
plan.description: Full access during the beta period. All features unlocked for free.

email.title: Update Email Address
email.description: Change the email address linked to your account. A confirmation link will be sent to verify the new address before the update is applied.

messages.confirmationSent: We've sent confirmation emails to both your current and new email addresses. Please check both inboxes and click the links to complete the process.

deleteConfirm.title: Are you absolutely sure?
deleteConfirm.description: This action will permanently delete your account and all associated data. This cannot be undone.

password.title: Update Password
password.description: Set a new password to keep your account secure. Choose something strong and unique — your changes will take effect immediately after saving.

form.validation: Password must be at least 8 characters long

sheet.title: Navigation
sheet.description: Quick access to your tools and settings.

confirm.title: Are you absolutely sure?
confirm.description: You'll need to sign in again to access your account.

hero.title: Sync
hero.description: Run your daily sync in real time. Choose who speaks next, manage the timing and flow, pause when needed, and guide your team through a focused, engaging stand-up from start to finish.

hero.title: Setup
hero.description: Configure your sync before it starts. Select who's in, set the timer, remove unavailable teammates, and fine-tune the flow to make sure your sync runs smoothly from the very first second.

tooltip.title: Estimated Sync time:
tooltip.description: Timer × Teammates + Timer for the host

hero.title: Teams
hero.description: Create, edit, and manage teams to align your projects with strategic goals. Assign teammates, clarify roles, and maintain a structured workspace that improves focus and coordination.

insert.title: Create Team
insert.description: Create a new team to start collaborating with your members.

update.title: Edit Team
update.description: Edit team info and manage their members.

name.label: Name
name.validation: Team name must be at least 2 characters

image.label: Image
image.placeholder: Got a cool picture? Paste the link

hero.title: Teammates
hero.description: Add, update, or remove teammates and assign them to the right teams. Strengthen collaboration by keeping your workspace organized and your people connected to what matters.

insert.description: Add a new teammate to start collaborating with your team.

update.title: Update Teammate
update.description: Update teammate info and manage their teams.
